title: What is the fishiest thing you have noticed in the 2020 presidential election? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Right has thrown in everything but the kitchen sink! 1.)Tara Reade. 2.) Hunter Biden/Burisa. 3.) Democrats are stalling the Covid relief. 4.) Democrats are burning down cities. 5.) Democrats are refusing federal help to control (peaceful protests) violence. 6.) Democrats are keeping the country locked down 7.) Democrats don't want to work.(As part of extending unemployment benefits rhetoric.) 8.) Hunter Biden again. 9.) Senators are investigating Biden's family connections to? **This reminds me of a common criminal defense strategy. 1.) Try- Change of venue! 2.) Try-throw out the confession! 3.) Try-discredit the witness! 4.) Try-exclude the witness or witness testimony! 5.) Try to get a new judge! 6.) Ask for a new trial! And on and on…

Republicans blatantly opposing democracy at every opportunity. Fake ballot boxes, too few ballot boxes, ridiculous voter ID’s, Census rigging, crippling the postal service, refusing ballots, throwing legit voters off of voting rolls, appointing biased electors, going to court to hide which ballots got tossed, anything to prevent people from voting. What a desperate ploy to keep a minority party in power. What could go wrong?

Few are talking about the issues in any detail or with any real concern. This election is about liking Trump or disliking Trump. Those that like Trump, have all sorts of delusions about how great he is and how great America is doing now at home and abroad, although they can’t say how or when they do just make shit up. Those that dislike trump don’t like him as a person, blame him for all the bad that has happened, and don’t really have much to say about policy at all.

So many things- but the one thing that is barely being talked about is Trump literally demanding that the Attorney General of the United States arrest his opponent in this election. To repeat: Trump is demanding his opponent- Joe Biden- be arrested. And Trumplicans are still voting for Trump And people wonder how Putin got elected.
The fake ballot boxes in California is open and unashamed corruption by the Republicans who are trying to damage the integrity of democracy. How could anybody consider voting for these people?

What seems fishy to me is that Biden is running the laziest, most bland, lowest profile campaign in history while some polls are showing him with a double digit lead, or close to it, ultimately allowing an uninspiring candidate to be handed the Presidency with a great big bow and zero effort.

everything from the Democrats. I can't point to a single thing they do that isn't immoral. Republicans aren't exactly choirboys and the only good thing I can say about them is they aren't as bad as the Democrats.

Bunker Biden hiding. Reminds me of Hillary who was absent at crucial times. I believe she was sick. It did not help her at all. This won’t help Biden either It is almost a given that left media is biased for Biden. This is not what they should be doing
The number of different ways that Republicans have tried to suppress votes from any area or group that might vote Democrat. It is astounding how craven and crooked they can be.
The fear in the eyes of the Trump gene pool.
The fishiest thing I have noticed about the 2020 presidential election is the Republicans. I’ve never seen a fishier group of pseudo-god-loving perverts of law and justice in my life.
